## match\_range() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

对数字进行模式匹配

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function match_range<T>(n: number, pattern: Record<string, T | ((range: MathRange) => T)>): T | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | number | 一个数字 |
|  pattern | Record&lt;string, T \| ((range: [MathRange](./utils.mathrange.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; T)&gt; | 模式匹配对象 |

**Returns:**

T \| null

返回值取决于模式对象

## Example


```ts
const result = match_range(15, {
    '[0, 10]': 0,
    '(10, 20]': (range) => range.end - range.start,
    '(20, 30]': 2,
    _: 0, // _ 表示匹配任意其他范围的数字
})   // result = 10
```
